bulkUpload.title: Bulk Upload
bulkUpload.subtitle: Import multiple categories and products at once using a CSV file

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.step2: Fill in your categories and products following the format
quickStart.step3: For nested categories, use " > " separator (e.g., "Electronics > Phones")
quickStart.step4: For product variants (sizes, colors, etc.), use multiple rows with the same product name but different "Variant Options"

guide.title: Complete CSV Format Guide
guide.columnsIntro: The CSV file has 10 columns. Here's what each column means and how to use it:

category.title: Category
category.description: The category path. Use " > " to create nested categories (parent > child).

productName.title: Product Name
productName.description: The name of your product. Leave empty for category-only rows. Multiple rows with the same name = product with variants.
productName.hint: Leave empty to create categories without products

variantOptions.title: Variant Options
variantOptions.description: Optional. Format: key1:value1|key2:value2. Leave empty for simple products or first row of variant products.
variantOptions.hint: Leave empty for products without variants

productDescription.title: Product Description
productDescription.description: Detailed description of the product. Only needed on first row of product (not on variant rows).
productDescription.example: Latest iPhone with A16 Bionic chip and Dynamic Island

price.title: Price
price.description: Product price (decimal number). For variants, each can have its own price.

stock.title: Stock
stock.description: Available quantity (whole number). For variants, this is the stock for that specific variant.

sku.title: SKU
sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (unique identifier). Auto-generated if left empty.

status.title: Status
status.description: Product status: ACTIVE or DRAFT. Defaults to ACTIVE if empty.

imageUrls.title: Image URLs
imageUrls.description: Product images. Multiple URLs separated by | (pipe). Only needed on first product row.

categoriesOnly.title: Example 1: Creating Categories Only
categoriesOnly.description: To create category structure without products, leave product columns empty:

productWithVariants.title: Example 3: Product with Variants (T-Shirt with Sizes & Colors)
productWithVariants.description: First row = base product info, following rows = variants:
productWithVariants.comment2: Note: Yellow row has base info + image, green rows define variants
productWithVariants.comment3: Black M has different price (32.99) than White variants (29.99)

phoneVariants.title: Example 4: Phone with Storage & Color Variants
phoneVariants.comment1: Creates: 1 product with 5 variants (different storage sizes and colors)
phoneVariants.comment2: Each storage upgrade increases price by $100

extraRows.title: Adding extra rows or notes after data
extraRows.description: CSV should only contain header + data rows. No blank lines, no notes at the end.

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.startSmall: Start small: Test with 2-3 products first, then upload your full catalog
tips.useExcel: Use Excel/Google Sheets: Easier to edit, then export as CSV
tips.keepBackup: Keep a backup: Save your CSV file before uploading
tips.reupload: Re-upload to update: If a product with the same name exists, it will be updated instead of creating a duplicate
tips.baseStock: Stock = 0 on base product: When using variants, set stock to 0 on the first row (base product), only variants need real stock numbers

template.title: CSV Template
template.description: Download the template to see the required format and examples

upload.title: Upload CSV File
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here

hero.title: Your Online Store,
hero.subtitle: A modern e-commerce platform designed for Georgian businesses. Launch your store and start selling online with ease.
hero.reassurance: Professional tools. Local support. No technical expertise required.

whyShopu.title: Designed for Georgian Commerce
whyShopu.subtitle: A platform tailored to the Georgian market, with local payment support and native language interface.

local.title: Local Market Focus
local.description: Built for Georgian businesses with local payment integrations, Georgian Lari support, and region-specific features.

support.description: Local support team available in your timezone, fluent in Georgian and ready to assist.

simple.title: Streamlined Experience

comparison.title: Focus on what matters
comparison.description: Spend less time on technical setup and more time growing your business.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.subtitle: Create your online store and join the growing community of Georgian e-commerce businesses.

content.p1: Shopu.ge is an e-commerce technology platform operating as a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution that enables registered users to create, configure, and manage their own online retail stores through the platform's digital infrastructure.
content.p2: The platform provides comprehensive e-commerce functionality including, but not limited to: online store creation and customization, product catalog management, order processing and fulfillment, payment gateway integration, and administrative dashboard access.
content.p3: Shopu.ge operates exclusively as a technology service provider and does not engage in the sale, distribution, or fulfillment of physical products or services to end consumers.
content.p4: All products and services displayed, advertised, or offered for sale through the platform are sold by independent third-party merchants who operate their own online stores. Each merchant is solely and exclusively responsible for all aspects of their business operations, including but not limited to product quality, pricing, delivery, customer service, and compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

merchants.title: Merchants (Online Stores)
merchants.p1: Pursuant to the platform's terms of service, each merchant utilizing the Shopu.ge platform is legally obligated to maintain and display accurate, current, and complete contact information within their online store. This information must include, at minimum: a valid telephone number, a functional email address, and a physical business address where applicable under Georgian law.
merchants.p2: Each merchant bears full legal responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, and currency of all information provided through their online store. Merchants are required to promptly update any changes to their contact information and are liable for any consequences arising from inaccurate or outdated information.

content.p1: Shopu.ge provides a digital Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform that enables registered users to create, customize, and manage online retail stores through a web-based interface.
content.p2: The service encompasses the following core functionalities: online store design and customization tools, product catalog management and inventory control, order processing and fulfillment systems, payment gateway integration and transaction processing, and comprehensive administrative dashboard access for store management.
content.p3: Shopu.ge operates solely as an intermediary technology platform and service provider. The platform does not act as a seller, distributor, or agent for any products or services offered by merchants. Shopu.ge has no involvement in, and assumes no responsibility for, the actual sale, delivery, or fulfillment of products or services transacted between merchants and their customers.

content.p1: Shopu.ge platform services are provided through a subscription-based pricing model. To initialize and activate an online store on the platform, a one-time setup fee of 1 Georgian Lari (GEL) is required.
content.p2: Following the initial setup, a recurring monthly subscription fee of 49 Georgian Lari (GEL) per month applies for continued access to the platform's services and features. The monthly subscription fee is automatically charged on a recurring basis unless the subscription is cancelled in accordance with the platform's terms and conditions.
content.p3: The prices, currency, and any additional costs (including but not limited to delivery fees) for products and services sold by merchants through the platform are determined solely by the individual merchants and are not controlled or set by Shopu.ge.
content.p4: During online payment transactions processed through the platform, payment processing fees may apply as determined by the payment service providers (such as Bank of Georgia or other financial institutions). These fees, which may include a percentage-based fee (e.g., 1%) plus a fixed transaction amount, are charged directly by the payment provider and deducted from the merchant's transaction proceeds. Shopu.ge does not charge, collect, or receive any portion of these payment processing fees, and merchants are solely responsible for all costs associated with payment processing.

content.p1: Shopu.ge operates exclusively as a technology platform provider and does not participate in, facilitate, or assume any responsibility for product delivery, shipping, returns, exchanges, order cancellations, or refund processes. All such transactions and related obligations are exclusively between the merchant and the end customer.
content.p2: Each merchant operating on the platform is required to establish, publish, and maintain their own policies regarding product delivery, shipping terms, return and exchange procedures, order cancellation terms, and refund eligibility criteria. These policies must be clearly displayed and accessible to customers within the merchant's online store and must comply with applicable Georgian consumer protection laws and regulations.
content.p3: Customers are strongly advised and expected to carefully review and understand the specific merchant's delivery, return, cancellation, and refund policies before completing any purchase transaction. Shopu.ge assumes no liability for disputes arising from delivery, returns, cancellations, or refunds between merchants and customers.

content.p1: Shopu.ge is committed to protecting user privacy and personal data in strict compliance with applicable data protection laws, including but not limited to the Law of Georgia on Personal Data Protection and relevant European Union data protection regulations where applicable.
content.p2: The platform collects, processes, and stores only the personal data that is strictly necessary and directly related to the following purposes: user account creation and authentication, service delivery and platform functionality, payment processing and financial transactions, order fulfillment facilitation, and compliance with legal obligations. All data collection is conducted with explicit user consent where required by law.
content.p3: Merchants receive access only to the minimum personal information necessary to process and fulfill customer orders, including but not limited to: customer name, delivery address, contact information, and order details. Merchants are contractually obligated to protect this information and use it solely for order fulfillment purposes.
content.p4: Shopu.ge does not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose personal data to third parties except: (a) as required by applicable law or legal process, (b) with explicit user consent, (c) to trusted service providers who are contractually bound to maintain confidentiality and use data only for specified purposes, or (d) in connection with business transfers or mergers as permitted by law. Users have the right to access, rectify, and request deletion of their personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

content.p1: By accessing, browsing, or using the Shopu.ge platform, website, or any associated services, users acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as the platform's Privacy Policy and all applicable laws and regulations of Georgia.
content.p2: Users are strictly prohibited from using the platform for any illegal, fraudulent, deceptive, or unauthorized purposes. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to: violation of any applicable local, national, or international laws; infringement of intellectual property rights, trademarks, or copyrights; distribution of harmful, offensive, or illegal content; engaging in fraudulent transactions; violation of third-party rights; and any activity that may harm, disrupt, or compromise the platform's security, integrity, or functionality.
content.p3: Shopu.ge reserves the absolute right, at its sole discretion, to suspend, restrict, or permanently terminate any user account or merchant account, with or without prior notice, in the event of: violation of these Terms and Conditions, violation of applicable laws or regulations, fraudulent or illegal activity, non-payment of fees, or any other conduct deemed harmful to the platform, other users, or third parties. Users whose accounts are terminated forfeit all access to the platform and any data associated with their accounts, subject to applicable data retention requirements.

payment.title: Complete Payment

billing.contactSupport: If you continue to see this message after retrying, please contact support for assistance.

billing.accessUntil: Your store will remain active until
billing.noFurtherCharges: No further charges will be processed.
